text: Z.P.G. (short for Zero Population Growth) is a 1972 Danish-American science fiction movie directed by Michael Campus and starring Oliver Reed, Geraldine Chaplin, Diane Cilento, Don Gordon. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:1972 science fiction movies Category:American science fiction movies Category:Danish science fiction movies Category:Dystopian movies Category:Paramount Pictures movies
title: Z.P.G.
